get.description: Lists all cloud providers available on Zilliz Cloud.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可列出所有可用的云服务商相关信息。

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be an API key with appropriate privileges.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为具备适当权限的 API 密钥。

200.description: Returns a list of all available cloud providers on Zilliz Cloud.

zh-CN.description: 返回可用的云服务商列表。

oneOf.description: Returns a list of applicable cloud providers.

zh-CN.description: 返回可用的云服务商列表。

cloudId.description: The ID of a cloud provider.

description.description: The description of the cloud provider.

zh-CN.description: 一个云服务提供商 ID 及描述。

data.description: Response payload, which is a list of cloud providers.

zh-CN.description: 响应返回一个云服务提供商列表。

data.description: Amazon Web Services
Google Cloud Platform
Microsoft Azure
Alibaba Cloud
Tencent Cloud

value.message: Token not found or unauthorized: The provided token does not exist in our records, or you do not have the necessary permissions to use this token. Please ensure you have the correct token.

get.description: Lists all clusters in the specified cloud region.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可列出指定云区域中的所有集群相关信息。

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of records to return on each page.

parameters.name: current
parameters.description: The current page number.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be an API key with appropriate privileges.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为具备适当权限的 API 密钥。

200.description: Returns a list of your clusters.

count.description: The total number of clusters returned.

currentPage.description: The current page in the results.

pageSize.description: The number of clusters per page in the results.

clusterId.description: The ID of the cluster.

description.description: An optional description about the cluster.

regionId.description: The ID of the region where the cluster exists.

clusterType.description: The type of CU associated with the cluster.

plan.description: The subscription plan associated with the cluster.

cuSize.description: The size of the CU associated with the cluster.

status.description: The current status of the cluster.

connectAddress.description: The public endpoint of the cluster. You can connect to the cluster using this endpoint from the public network.

zh-CN.description: 集群的公网地址。你可以从公网连接到集群。

privateLinkAddress.description: The private endpoint of the cluster. You can set up a private link to allow your VPS in the same cloud region to access your cluster.

zh-CN.description: 集群的私网地址。你可以设置私有连接，使你的 VPS 同属于同一云区域的用户可以访问你的集群。

projectId.description: The ID of the project where the cluster resides.

createTime.description: The time at which the cluster has been created.

clusters.description: An array of clusters in detail.

data.description: Response payload, which is a list of clusters.

zh-CN.description: 响应载荷，包含集群列表。

value.message: Token not found or unauthorized: The provided token does not exist in our records, or you do not have the necessary permissions to use this token. Please ensure you have the correct token.

post.description: Imports data from files stored in a specified object storage bucket.

zh-CN.description: 从指定对象存储桶中导入数据。

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be <include target="zilliz">an API key with appropriate privileges or </include>a pair of colon-joined username and password, like `username:password`.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为<include target="zilliz">具备适当权限的 API 密钥或</include>用冒号分隔的用户名和密码，如 `username:password`。

clusterId.description: The ID of a cluster to which this operation applies.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to which this operation applies.

partitionName.description: The name of the partition to which this operation applies.

objectUrl.description: The URL of the object that stores the data to be imported.

zh-CN.description: 存储待导入数据的对象 URL。

accessKey.description: The access key used to access the specified object.

zh-CN.description: 用于访问指定对象的 Access Key。

secretKey.description: The secret access key used to access the specified object.

zh-CN.description: 用于访问指定对象的 Secret Key。

200.description: Returns a import task job ID.

jobId.description: The ID of the import job that has been submitted.

zh-CN.description: 提交的导入任务的 ID。

data.description: Response payload, which is an object containing the import job ID.

zh-CN.description: 响应载荷，为一个包含导入任务 ID 的对象。

value.message: Token not found or unauthorized: The provided token does not exist in our records, or you do not have the necessary permissions to use this token. Please ensure you have the correct token.

get.description: Describe a specific pipeline by its name.

zh-CN.description: 从指定对象存储桶中导入数据。

parameters.name: PIPELINE_ID
parameters.description: A valid pipeline ID obtained from either the list-pipelines API endpoints or Zilliz Cloud console in the format of `pipe-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx`.

zh-CN.description: 通过查看 Pipeline 列表或 Zilliz Cloud 控制台获取的合法 Pipeline ID。格式通常为 `pipe-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx`。

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be an API key with appropriate privileges.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为具备适当权限的 API 密钥。

zh-CN.description: 表示当前操作是否成功。

data.description: Response payload when the pipeline is an Ingestion Pipeline.

zh-CN.description: 当指定 Pipeline 为 Ingestion Pipeline 时，返回的响应数据。

type.description: Type of the pipeline. For an ingestion pipeline, the value should be `INGESTION`.

zh-CN.description: Pipeline 的类型。Ingestion pipeline 的该参数值仅可以是 `INGESTION`。

createTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the pipeline is created.

status.description: Current status of the pipeline. If the value is other than `SERVING`, the pipeline is not working.

zh-CN.description: Pipeline 的当前状态。如果值不是 `SERVING`，则 Pipeline 不工作。

items.description: Statistics on the total token usage of the pipeline.

zh-CN.description: 当前 Pipeline 的总用量统计。

embedding.description: The total token usage of the embedding model.

zh-CN.description: Embedding 模型 Token 总用量。

totalUsage.description: The total token usage of the pipeline.

zh-CN.description: 当 Pipeline 为 Text Ingestion 类型时使用的函数列表。

zh-CN.description: Function 类型。文本 Ingestion pipeline 的该参数值仅可以是 `INDEX_TEXT` 或 `PRESERVE`。

inputFields.description: Name the field according to your needs. For a text ingestion pipeline, use it for a list of texts to be ingested.

zh-CN.description: 根据您的需求为输入字段命名。文本 Ingestion pipeline 的输入字段中用于输入需要 Ingest 的文本列表。

embedding.description: Name of the embedding model in use.

zh-CN.description: Function 类型。文档 Ingestion pipeline 的该参数值仅可以是 `INDEX_DOC` 或 `PRESERVE`。

inputField.description: Name the field according to your needs. For a doc ingestion pipeline, use it for the pre-signed url of the doc to be ingested.

langauge.description: Language that your source data is in.

chunkSize.description: The maximum size of a splitted document segment. The allowed chunk size range depends on the embedding model in use. For more information, refer to [Zilliz Cloud Limits](https://docs.zilliz.com/docs/limits#ingestion)

zh-CN.description: 分割文档片段的最大大小。该参数取决于使用的 Embedding 模型。具体限制信息请参阅 [使用限制](https://docs.zilliz.com.cn/docs/limits#ingestion)。

embedding.description: Name of the embedding model in use.

splitBy.description:
The splitters for Zilliz Cloud to split the specified document into smaller chunks. The value defaults to `["

", "
", " ", ""]`.

zh-CN.description:
用于分割文本的 Splitter。Ingestion Pipeline 会根据定义的字符按顺序将文本分割成小片段。默认使用`["

", "
", " ", ""]` 作为分隔符。

zh-CN.description: Function 类型。图像 Ingestion pipeline 的该参数值仅可以是 `INDEX_IMAGE` 或 `PRESERVE`。

inputFields.description: Name the fields according to your needs. In an image ingestion pipeline: `image_url` stands for pre-signed image URLs in object storage buckets, and `image_id` stands for the image ID.

zh-CN.description: 根据您的需求为输入字段命名。图像 Ingestion pipeline 的输入字段中用于输入需要 Ingest 的图像对象存储预签名 URL（`image_url`）和图像 ID（`image_id`）。

embedding.description: Name of the embedding model in use.

zh-CN.description: Function 名称。Function 名称应该在 3-64 个字符内，且只可包含数字、字母和下划线。

reranker.description: A reranking model used to rank a set of candidate outputs to improve the quality of the search results. Currently, the only possible value is `zilliz/bge-reranker-base`. For more information, refer to [Reranker](https://docs.zilliz.com/docs/reranker).

result.text: Zilliz Cloud is a fully managed vector database and data services, empowering you to unlock the full potential of unstructured data for your AI applications.

result.chunk_text:
# Cluster, Collection & Entities
A Zilliz Cloud cluster is a managed Milvus instance associated with certain computing resources. You can create collections in the cluster and insert entities into them. In comparison to a relational database, a collection in a cluster is similar to a table in the database, and an entity in a collection is similar to a record in the table.\n\n# Cluster, Collection & Entities
## Cluster
When creating a cluster on Zilliz Cloud, you must specify the type of CU associated with the cluster. There are three types of CUs available: performance-optimized, capacity-optimized, and cost-optimized. You can learn how to choose among these types in [Select the Right CU](https://zilliverse.feishu.cn/wiki/UgqvwKh2QiKE1kkYNLJcaHt0nkg).  
After determining the CU type, you must also specify its size. Note that the number of collections a cluster can hold varies based on its CU size. A cluster with less than 8 CUs can hold no more than 32 collections, while a cluster with more than 8 CUs can hold as many as 256 collections.  
All collections in a cluster share the CUs associated with the cluster. To save CUs, you can unload some collections. When a collection is unloaded, its data is moved to disk storage and its CUs are freed up for use by other collections. You can load the collection back into memory when you need to query it. Keep in mind that loading a collection requires some time, so you should only do so when necessary.\n\n# Cluster, Collection & Entities
## Collection
A collection collects data in a two-dimensional table with a fixed number of columns and a variable number of rows. In the table, each column corresponds to a field, and each row represents an entity.  
The following figure shows a sample collection that comprises six entities and eight fields.

# Cluster, Collection & Entities
## Collection
### Index
Unlike Milvus instances, Zilliz Cloud clusters only support the **AUTOINDEX** algorithm for indexing. This algorithm is optimized for the three types of computing units (CUs) supported by Zilliz Cloud. For more information, see [AUTOINDEX Explained](https://zilliverse.feishu.cn/wiki/EA2twSf5oiERMDkriKScU9GInc4).\n\n# Cluster, Collection & Entities
## Entities
Entities in a collection are data records sharing the same set of fields, like a book in a library or a gene in a genome. As to an entity, the data stored in each field forms the entity.  
By specifying a query vector, search metrics, and optional filtering conditions, you can conduct vector searches among the entities in a collection. For example, if you search with the keyword "Interesting Python demo", any article whose title implies such semantic meaning will be returned as a relevant result. During this process, the search is actually conducted on the vector field **title_vector** to retrieve the top K nearest results. For details on vector searches, see [Search and Query](https://zilliverse.feishu.cn/wiki/YfMEwLHzeisARCk4VZ3cVhJmnjd).  
You can add as many entities to a collection as you want. However, the size that an entity takes grows along with the increase of the dimensions of the vectors in the entity, reversely affecting the performance of searches within the collection. Therefore, plan your collection wisely on Zilliz Cloud by referring to [Schema Explained](https://zilliverse.feishu.cn/wiki/TqMFwNyDbiY9qekBfPNcbpuvnib).

# Cluster, Collection & Entities
## Collection
### Fields
In most cases, people describe an object in terms of its attributes, including size, weight, position, etc. These attributes of the object are similar to the fields in a collection.  
Among all the fields in a collection, the primary key is one of the most special, because the values stored in this field are unique throughout the entire collection. Each primary key maps to a different record in the collection.  
In the collection shown in Figure 1, the **id** field is the primary key. The first ID **0** maps to the article titled *The Mortality Rate of Coronavirus is Not Important*, and will not be used in any other records in this collection.\n\n# Cluster, Collection & Entities
## Collection
### Schema
Fields have their own properties, such as data types and related constraints for storing data in the field, like vector dimensions and distance metrics. By defining fields and their order, you will get a skeletal data structure termed schema, which shapes a collection in a way that resembles constructing the structure of a data table.  
For your reference, Zilliz Cloud supports the following field data types:  
- Boolean value (BOOLEAN)
- 8-byte floating-point (DOUBLE)
- 4-byte floating-point (FLOAT)
- Float vector (FLOAT_VECTOR)
- 8-bit integer (INT8)
- 32-bit integer (INT32)
- 64-bit integer (INT64)
- Variable character (VARCHAR)
- [JSON](https://zilliverse.feishu.cn/wiki/H04VwNGoaimjcLkxoH4cs5TQnNd)  
Zilliz Cloud provides three types of CUs, each of which have its own application scenarios, and they are also the factor that impacts search performance.  
> 📘 Notes
>
> **FLOAT_VECTOR** is the only data type that supports vector embeddings in Zilliz Cloud clusters.

dbName.description: The name of an existing database.

collectionName.description: The name of an existing collection. If specified, only returns aliases of the specified collection. If not specified, returns aliases of all collections in the database.

clusterId.description: ID of a cluster.

regionId.description: ID of the cloud region hosting the cluster.

cuType.description:
CU type of the cluster.

集群 CU 类型。
仅适用于 Dedicated 集群。对于免费和无服务器集群，该值为空。

cuSize.description: CU size of the cluster. For free and serverless clusters, the value is always `0`.

集群 CU 大小。
对于免费和无服务器集群，该值始终为 0。

status.description: Current status of the cluster.

集群私有访问端点 (Private Link)。

projectId.description: ID of the project to which the cluster belongs.

createTime.description: Time at which the cluster has been created.

userName.description: The name of the target user. The value should start with a letter and can only contain underline, letters and numbers.

待创建用户的用户名。
用户名须以字母开头，并包含下划线、字母和数字。

password.description:
The corresponding password to the user. 
The password must must include at least three of the following character types: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

post.description: This operation creates a collection in a specified cluster.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可在指定集群中创建 Collection。

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be <include target="zilliz">an API key with appropriate privileges or </include>a pair of colon-joined username and password, like `username:password`.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为<include target="zilliz">具备适当权限的 API 密钥或</include>用冒号分隔的用户名和密码，如 `username:password`。

schema.description:
Creates a collection in either the quick-setup mode or the custom-setup mode. 

In the quick-setup mode, the schema of the created collection has two schema-defined fields named `id` and `vector` and enabled the dynamic field feature. 

In the custom-setup mode, the schema is defined by the user and the dynamic field feature is disabled by default.

zh-CN.description:
支持使用快速建表方式和自定义建表方式创建 Collection。

在快速建表方式下，创建的 Collection 具有两个由 Schema 定义的字段 `id` 和 `vector`，并启用了动态字段功能。

在自定义建表方式下，用户可以自定义 Collection 的 Schema，并默认禁用了动态字段功能。

dbName.description: The name of the database.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to create.

zh-CN.description: 待创建 Collection 的名称。

dimension.description:
The number of dimensions a vector value should have.
This is required if **dtype** of this field is set to **DataType.FLOAT\_VECTOR** or **DataType.Binary\_VECTOR**.

zh-CN.description:
向量值的维度数。
若该字段的 **dtype** 为 **DataType.FLOAT\_VECTOR** 或 **DataType.Binary\_VECTOR**，则该字段为必填项。

metricType.description: The metric type applied to this operation.

zh-CN.description: 当前 Collection 的度量类型。

idType.description: The data type of the primary field. This parameter is designed for the quick-setup of a collection and will be ignored if __schema__ is defined.

zh-CN.description: 主键字段数据类型。该参数为快速创建 Collection 而设计，若您已定义 __schema__ 字段，则该参数将被忽略。

autoID.description: Whether the primary field automatically increments. This parameter is designed for the quick-setup of a collection and will be ignored if __schema__ is defined.

zh-CN.description: 主键是否自动增长。该参数为快速创建 Collection 而设计，若您已定义 __schema__ 字段，则该参数将被忽略。

primaryFieldName.description: The name of the primary field. This parameter is designed for the quick-setup of a collection and will be ignored if __schema__ is defined.

zh-CN.description: 主键字段名称。该参数为快速创建 Collection 而设计，若您已定义 __schema__ 字段，则该参数将被忽略。

vectorFieldName.description: The name of the vector field. This parameter is designed for the quick-setup of a collection and will be ignored if __schema__ is defined.

zh-CN.description: 向量字段名称。该参数为快速创建 Collection 而设计，若您已定义 __schema__ 字段，则该参数将被忽略。

dbName.description: The name of the database.

collectionName.description: The name of the collection to create.

zh-CN.description: 待创建 Collection 的名称。

schema.description: The schema is responsible for organizing data in the target collection. A valid schema should have multiple fields, which must include a primary key, a vector field, and several scalar fields. Setting this parameter means that `dimension`, `idType`, `autoID`, `primaryFieldName`, and `vectorFieldName` will be ignored.

zh-CN.description: Schema 决定了 Collection 中数据的组织方式。一个有效的 Schema 应包含多个字段，其中必须包含主键字段、向量字段以及多个标量字段。设置本参数时，`dimension`、 `idType`、`autoID`、`primaryFieldName`、`vectorFieldName` 等参数将被忽略。

autoID.description: Whether allows the primary field to automatically increment. Setting this to True makes the primary field automatically increment. In this case, the primary field should not be included in the data to insert to avoid errors. Set this parameter in the field with is_primary set to True.

zh-CN.description: 是否允许主键字段自动增长。将该参数设置为 `True` 则主键字段将自动增长。在这种情况下，请不要在插入数据时包含主键字段，以避免错误。如果当前字段的 `is_primary` 参数设置为 `True`，则本参数为必填项。

enableDynamicField.description: Whether allows to use the reserved __$meta__ field to hold non-schema-defined fields in key-value pairs.

zh-CN.description: 是否允许使用保留字段 __$meta__ 来保存 Schema 中未定义的字段。

fieldName.description: The name of the field to create in the target collection

zh-CN.description: 目标 Collection 中待创建的字段名称。

dataType.description: The data type of the field values.

elementDataType.description: The data type of the elements in an array field. This is required if the current field is of the array type.

zh-CN.description: 数组字段中各元素的数据类型。若当前字段为数组类型，则该参数为必填项。

isPrimary.description: Whether the current field is the primary field. Setting this to True makes the current field the primary field.

zh-CN.description: 当前字段是否为主键字段。将该参数设置为 `True` 则当前字段将成为主键字段。此时，还需要确定 `autoID` 参数的取值。

isPartitionKey.description: Whether the current field serves as the partition key. Setting this to True makes the current field serve as the partition key. In this case, <include target="milvus">Milvus</include><include target="milvus">Zilliz Cloud</include> manages all partitions in the current collection.

zh-CN.description: 当前字段是否为 Partition Key。将该参数设置为 `True` 则当前字段将作为 Partition Key。在这种情况下，<include target="milvus">Milvus</include><include target="milvus">Zilliz Cloud</include> 会管理当前 Collection 中的所有 Partition。

max_length.description: An optional parameter for VarChar values that determines the maximum length of the value in the current field.

zh-CN.description: 如果当前字段的数据类型为 VarChar，则该参数为必填项，用于设置该字段值的最大长度。

dim.description: An optional parameter for FloatVector or BinaryVector fields that determines the vector dimension.

zh-CN.description: 如果当前字段的数据类型为 FloatVector 或 BinaryVector，则该参数为必填项，用于设置向量维度。

max_capacity.description: An optional parameter for Array field values that determines the maximum number of elements in the current array field.

zh-CN.description: 如果当前字段的数据类型为 Array，则该参数为必填项，用于设置该字段值的最大元素数量。

metricType.description: The similarity metric type used to build the index. For more information, refer to <include target="zilliz">Similarity Metrics Explained](/docs/search-metrics-explained)</include><include target="milvus">Similarity Metrics](https://milvus.io/docs/metric.md)</include>.

zh-CN.description: 用于构建索引的相似度类型。更多详情，请参考<include target="zilliz">相似度指标详解</include><include target="milvus">相似度指标](https://milvus.io/docs/metric.md)</include>。

fieldName.description: The name of the target field on which an index is to be created.

zh-CN.description: 要创建索引的目标字段名称。

indexName.description: The name of the index to create. The value defaults to the target field name.

zh-CN.description: 要创建的索引名称。该值默认为目标字段名称。

params.description: The index type and related settings. <include target="milvus">For details, refer to [Vector Indexes](https://milvus.io/docs/index.md).</include><include target="zilliz">For Zilliz Cloud clusters, you should always set `index_type` to `AUTOINDEX`.</include>

zh-CN.description: 索引类型及相关设置。<include target="milvus">详细信息请参考[向量索引](https://milvus.io/docs/index.md)</include><include target="zilliz">对于 Zilliz Cloud 集群而言，请始终将 `index_type` 设置成 `AUTOINDEX`</include>。

index_type.description: The type of the index to create

zh-CN.description: 要创建的索引类型。<include target="zilliz">对于 Zilliz Cloud 集群而言，请始终将 `index_type` 设置成 `AUTOINDEX`</include>

M.description: The maximum degree of the node. This applies only when **index_type** is set to __HNSW__.

zh-CN.description: 数据节点与其他节点连接的边数。此参数仅适用于**索引类型**为 __HNSW__ 的情况。

efConstruction.description: The search scope. This applies only when **index_type** is set to __HNSW__.

zh-CN.description: 搜索范围。此参数仅适用于**索引类型**为 __HNSW__ 的情况。

nlist.description: The number of cluster units. This applies only when **index_type** is set to __IVF-related__ index types.

zh-CN.description: 数据集群单元的数量。此参数仅适用于**索引类型**为 __IVF__ 系列索引的情况。

indexParams.description: The parameters that apply to the index-building process.

zh-CN.description: 索引构建所需相关参数。
创建 Collection 的附加参数。

max_length.description: The maximum number of characters in a VarChar field. This parameter is mandatory when the current field type is VarChar.

zh-CN.description: 设置 VarChar 字段的最大长度。如果当前字段类型为 VarChar 时，该参数为必填项。

enableDynamicField.description: Whether to enable the reserved dynamic field. If set to true, non-schema-defined fields are saved in the reserved dynamic field as key-value pairs.

zh-CN.description: 是否启用保留的动态字段。如果设置为 `true`，则非 Schema 定义的字段将以键值对的形式保存被保存到保留的动态字段中。

shardsNum.description: The number of shards to create along with the current collection.

zh-CN.description: 随当前 Collection 创建的 Shard 数量。

consistencyLevel.description: The consistency level of the collection.

zh-CN.description: 当前 Collection 的一致性级别。

partitionsNum.description: The number of partitions to create along with the current collection. This parameter is mandatory if one field of the collection has been designated as the partition key.

zh-CN.description: 随当前 Collection 创建的 Partition 数量。如果当前 Collection 中有指定为 Partition Key 的字段，则该参数为必填项。

ttlSeconds.description: The time-to-live (TTL) period of the collection. If set, the collection is to be dropped once the period ends.

zh-CN.description: 当前 Collection 的 TTL 时间。如果设置，则在 TTL 时间结束后，该 Collection 将被删除。

data.description: Response payload which is an empty object.

mmmap.enabled.description: Whether to enable the memory-mapped feature for the collection. Setting this to `true` allows the collection to be accessed directly from disk without loading it into memory, which can extend collection capacity.

zh-CN.description: 是否启用内存映射特性。将该属性设置为 `true` 允许直接从磁盘访问 Collection，而无需将其加载到内存，从而扩大 Collection 容量。

collection.ttl.seconds.description: The time-to-live (TTL) of the collection in seconds. Setting this to a non-zero values enables automatic deletion of expired documents from the collection after the specified number of seconds.

zh-CN.description: Collection 的 TTL（秒）。将该属性设置为非零值将在指定秒数后自动删除过期文档。

partitionkey.isolation.description: Whether to enable partition key isolation for the collection. Setting this to `true` ensures that documents with the same partition key are always stored in the same partition, which can improve query performance.

zh-CN.description: 是否启用分区键隔离特性。将该属性设置为 `true` 确保具有相同分区键的文档始终存储在相同的分区中，从而提高查询性能。

post.description: Query the metrics of a specific cluster.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可以查询指定集群的统计指标。

parameters.name: CLUSTER_ID
parameters.description: ID of the target cluster.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be an API key with appropriate privileges.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为具备适当权限的 API 密钥。

start.description: The starting date and time for the metric reporting period, expressed in ISO 8601 timestamp format in UTC. Include this parameter and `end` when the `period` parameter is not set.

zh-CN.description: 指标报告期间的起始日期和时间，以 UTC 时间格式的 ISO 8601 时间戳表示。当 `period` 参数未设置时，需同时包含 `start` 和 `end` 参数。

end.description: The ending date and time for the metric reporting period, expressed in ISO 8601 timestamp format in UTC. Include this parameter and `start` when the `period` parameter is not set.

zh-CN.description: 指标报告期间的结束日期和时间，以 UTC 时间格式的 ISO 8601 时间戳表示。当 `period` 参数未设置时，需同时包含 `start` 和 `end` 参数。

period.description: The duration over which Zilliz Cloud reports the metrics, expressed in ISO 8601 duration format in UTC. Include this parameter when both `start` and `end` parameters are not set.

zh-CN.description: Zilliz Cloud 向用户报告指标的持续时间，以 UTC 时间格式的 ISO 8601 持续时间表示。当 `start` 和 `end` 参数未设置时，需同时包含 `period` 参数。

granularity.description: The time interval at which Zilliz Cloud reports the metrics, expressed in ISO 8601 duration format in UTC. The minimum granularity is PT30S.

zh-CN.description: Zilliz Cloud 向用户报告指标的时间间隔，以 UTC 时间格式的 ISO 8601 持续时间表示。最小粒度为 PT30S。

metricName.description:
Name of a metric.
For possible values, refer to the enumerations.
For details on these metrics, refer to [Metrics & Alerts Reference](/docs/metrics-alerts-reference).

zh-CN.description:
指标名称。
可选值请参考枚举。
关于这些指标的详细信息，请参考[指标与告警参考](/docs/metrics-alerts-reference)章节。

stat.description: The statistical method to apply to the metric. Valid values include **AVG** (average) and **P99** (99th percentile) for latency metrics. **AVG** is available for all other metrics.

zh-CN.description: 当前指标使用的统计方法。对于延迟指标，可选值为 **AVG**（平均值）和 **P99**（99百分位）。对于其他指标，**AVG** 均可使用。

200.description: Return the collected statistics on the specified metric in detail.

zh-CN.description: 返回指定指标的相关统计信息。

unit.description: Unit of the value in the statistics.

timestamp.description: The timestamp for the data point in ISO 8601 format.

zh-CN.description: ISO 8601 格式的数据点时间戳。

value.description: The value of the metric at the given timestamp.

items.description: Statistics collected within an interval period.

zh-CN.description: 在采集周期内收集到的统计信息。

values.description: List of collected statistics at an interval.

zh-CN.description: 在采集周期内收集到的统计信息列表。

results.description: List of collected statistics on the specified metric.

zh-CN.description: 对指定指标采集到的统计信息列表。

data.description: Response payload.

parameters.description: The authentication token should be <include target="zilliz">an API key with appropriate privileges or </include>a pair of colon-joined username and password, like `username:password`.

collectionName.description: The name of a collection.

zh-CN.description: Partition 名称列表。如果指定了 Partition 名称，释放任何一个 Partition 都会导致返回 NotLoad 状态。

200.description: A LoadState object that indicates the load status of the specified collection.

zh-CN.description: 返回指定 Collection 的加载状态。

data.description: A LoadState object that indicates the load status and load progress of the specified collection.

zh-CN.description: 返回指定 Collection 的加载状态和加载进度。

loadState.description: An object that indicates the load status of the specified collection.

zh-CN.description: 指定 Collection 的加载状态。

loadProgress.description: An integer that indicates the load progress in the percentage of the specified collection.

zh-CN.description: 指定 Collection 的加载进度。

get.description: List the information about the specified backup in detail. Note that this API only applies to dedicated clusters.

data.description: Response payload which is the information about the backup in detail.

clusterId.description: The ID of the cluster that holds the backup.

clusterName.description: The name of the cluster that holds the backup.

projectId.description: The ID of the project that holds the backed-up cluster.

backupType.description: The type of resources backed up.

creationMethod.description: Whether the backup was created manually or automatically.

status.description: The current status of the backup.

size.description: The size of the backup in bytes.

regionId.description: The ID of the cloud region where the backup is located.

expireTime.description: The expiration time of the backup.

dbCollections.description: A list of databases and its collections that are included in the backup.

items.description: A database and its collections that are included in the backup.

collections.description: The collections that are included in the backup.

get.description: List the backup policy of the specified cluster in detail. Note that this API only applies to dedicated clusters.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可获取指定集群的自动备份策略。仅适用于 Dedicated 集群。

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be an API key with appropriate privileges.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为具备适当权限的 API 密钥。

parameters.name: CLUSTER_ID
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster whose backup is in concern.

200.description: response

data.description: Response payload which is the backup policy of the specified cluster.

clusterId.description: The ID of the cluster whose backup policy is in concern.

status.description: The status of the backup policy.

startTime.description: The start time is a two hour duration for the backup policy to execute in the format of HH:mm-HH:mm UTC time. When the backup policy is disabled, the value is `null`.

frequency.description: The week days on which the backup is performed. The value is a comma-separated list of numbers from 1 to 7, where 1 represents Monday and 7 represents Sunday. When the backup policy is disabled, the value is `null`.

retentionDays.description: The number of days to retain the backup. When the backup policy is disabled, the value is `0`.

post.description: Set up the backup policy for the specified cluster so that Zilliz Cloud automatically backs up your cluster at the specified interval. Note that this API only applies to dedicated clusters.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可为指定集群创建自动备份策略。仅适用于 Dedicated 集群。

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The authentication token should be an API key with appropriate privileges.

zh-CN.description: 认证令牌，应为具备适当权限的 API 密钥。

parameters.name: CLUSTER_ID
parameters.description: The ID of the target cluster whose backup is in concern.

frequency.description: The week days on which the backup is performed. The value is a comma-separated list of numbers from 1 to 7, where 1 represents Monday and 7 represents Sunday.

startTime.description: The start time is a two-hour duration for the backup policy to execute in the format of HH:mm-HH:mm UTC time.

retentionDays.description: The number of days to retain the backup.

enabled.description: Whether automatic backup is enabled or not.

200.description: response

clusterId.description: The ID of the cluster whose backup policy is in concern.

status.description: The status of the backup policy.

post.description: Restore cluster backup to a new dedicated cluster of the same CU type in the same cloud region. Note that this API only applies to dedicated clusters.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可将指定备份记录恢复到同一云区域内相同 CU 类型的新集群中。仅适用于 Dedicated 集群。

parameters.description: The authentication token should be an API key with appropriate privileges.

clusterName.description: The name of the restored cluster.

cuSize.description: The CU size allocated to the restored cluster.

collectionStatus.description: The status of the collections in the restored cluster.

data.description: Response payload which is the information of the restored cluster.

clusterId.description: The ID of the restored cluster.

username.description: The username used to access the restored cluster.

password.description: The password used to access the restored cluster. This is shown only once. You are advised to note down the password and save it in a secure place.

jobId.description: The ID of the cluster restoration job created upon this request.

post.description: Restore collection backup to an existing cluster. Note that this API only applies to dedicated clusters.

zh-CN.description: 本接口可将指定 Collection 备份恢复到已存在的任一集群。仅适用于 Dedicated 集群。

parameters.description: The ID of the backup in concern.

destClusterId.description: The ID of the cluster to which the restored collection belongs.

dbName.description: The name of the source database containing the collections listed in the `collectionNames` field.

destDbName.description: The name of the destination database to which the specified collections will be restored.

collections.description: Currently, Zilliz Cloud restores only one collection at a time. Therefore, include only one collection name in the list. If this is left unspecified, all collections in the backup will be restored to the target cluster unloaded.

collectionName.description: The name of the source collection to restore.

targetCollectionName.description: The name of the target collection.

targetCollectionStatus.description: The status of the target collection.

data.description: Response payload which is the ID of an asynchronous control-plane job.

jobId.description: The ID of a collection restoration job created upon this request.

post.description: This operation creates a resource group. A Milvus instance begins with a default resource group that includes all available query nodes. You can create additional resource groups, reassign specific query nodes from the default group, and load collections into the query nodes in these newly configured groups. This operation always succeeds no matter whether the resource group exists.

zh-CN.description: 本操作创建资源组。Milvus 实例在启动后创建一个默认资源组，包含所有可用的 QueryNodes。您可以创建其他资源组，将部分 QueryNodes 从默认组重新分配到这些新配置的组中，并将 Collection 加载到这些新配置的组中的 QueryNodes 上。无论资源组是否存在，此操作都始终成功。
